column2: رَّبُّ السَّمَوَتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فَاعْبُدْهُ وَاصْطَبِرْ لِعِبَدَتِهِ هَلْ تَعْلَمُ لَهُ سَمِيًّا
column3: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them - so worship Him and have patience for His worship. Do you know of any similarity to Him?"

column2: وَيَقُولُ الْإِنسَنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوْفَ أُخْرَجُ حَيًّا
column3: And man [i.e., the disbeliever] says, "When I have died, am I going to be brought forth alive?"

column2: أَوَلَا يَذْكُرُ الْإِنسَنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَهُ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ يَكُ شَئًْا
column3: Does man not remember that We created him before, while he was nothing?

column2: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ وَالشَّيَطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ حَوْلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيًّا
column3: So by your Lord, We will surely gather them and the devils; then We will bring them to be present around Hell upon their knees.

column2: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمْ أَشَدُّ عَلَى الرَّحْمَنِ عِتِيًّا
column3: Then We will surely extract from every sect those of them who were worst against the Most Merciful in insolence.

column2: ثُمَّ لَنَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِالَّذِينَ هُمْ أَوْلَى بِهَا صِلِيًّا
column3: Then, surely it is We who are most knowing of those most worthy of burning therein.

column2: وَإِن مِّنكُمْ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَا كَانَ عَلَى رَبِّكَ حَتْمًا مَّقْضِيًّا
column3: And there is none of you except he will come to it. This is upon your Lord an inevitability decreed.

column2: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّى الَّذِينَ اتَّقَوا وَّنَذَرُ الظَّلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيًّا
column3: Then We will save those who feared Allah and leave the wrongdoers within it, on their knees.

column2: وَإِذَا تُتْلَى عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَتُنَا بَيِّنَتٍ قَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا أَىُّ الْفَرِيقَيْنِ خَيْرٌ مَّقَامًا وَأَحْسَنُ نَدِيًّا
column3: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Which of [our] two parties is best in position and best in association?"

column2: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَحْسَنُ أَثَثًا وَرِءْيًا
column3: And how many a generation have We destroyed before them who were better in possessions and [outward] appearance?

column2: قُلْ مَن كَانَ فِى الضَّلَلَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ لَهُ الرَّحْمَنُ مَدًّا حَتَّى إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا الْعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا السَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضْعَفُ جُندًا
column3: Say, "Whoever is in error - let the Most Merciful extend for him an extension [in wealth and time] until, when they see that which they were promised - either punishment [in this world] or the Hour [of resurrection] - they will come to know who is worst in position and weaker in soldiers."

column2: وَيَزِيدُ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ اهْتَدَوْا هُدًى وَالْبَقِيَتُ الصَّلِحَتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ مَّرَدًّا
column3: And Allah increases those who were guided, in guidance, and the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for recourse.

column2: أَفَرَءَيْتَ الَّذِى كَفَرَ بَِٔايَتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالًا وَوَلَدًا
column3: Then, have you seen he who disbelieved in Our verses and said, "I will surely be given wealth and children [in the next life]"?

column2: أَطَّلَعَ الْغَيْبَ أَمِ اتَّخَذَ عِندَ الرَّحْمَنِ عَهْدًا
column3: Has he looked into the unseen, or has he taken from the Most Merciful a promise?

column2: كَلَّا سَنَكْتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُ مِنَ الْعَذَابِ مَدًّا
column3: No! We will record what he says and extend [i.e., increase] for him from the punishment extensively.

column2: وَنَرِثُهُ مَا يَقُولُ وَيَأْتِينَا فَرْدًا
column3: And We will inherit him [in] what he mentions, and he will come to Us alone.

column2: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لِّيَكُونُوا لَهُمْ عِزًّا
column3: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor.

column2: كَلَّا سَيَكْفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضِدًّا
column3: No! They [i.e., those "gods"] will deny their worship of them and will be against them opponents [on the Day of Judgement].

column2: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا الشَّيَطِينَ عَلَى الْكَفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمْ أَزًّا
column3: Do you not see that We have sent the devils upon the disbelievers, inciting them [to evil] with [constant] incitement?

column2: فَلَا تَعْجَلْ عَلَيْهِمْ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمْ عَدًّا
column3: So be not impatient over them. We only count out [i.e., allow] to them a [limited] number.

column2: يَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ الْمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى الرَّحْمَنِ وَفْدًا
column3: On the Day We will gather the righteous to the Most Merciful as a delegation

column2: وَنَسُوقُ الْمُجْرِمِينَ إِلَى جَهَنَّمَ وِرْدًا
column3: And will drive the criminals to Hell in thirst

column2: لَّا يَمْلِكُونَ الشَّفَعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ اتَّخَذَ عِندَ الرَّحْمَنِ عَهْدًا
column3: None will have [power of] intercession except he who had taken from the Most Merciful a covenant.

column2: وَقَالُوا اتَّخَذَ الرَّحْمَنُ وَلَدًا
column3: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken [for Himself] a son."

column2: لَّقَدْ جِئْتُمْ شَئًْا إِدًّا
column3: You have done an atrocious thing.

column2: تَكَادُ السَّمَوَتُ يَتَفَطَّرْنَ مِنْهُ وَتَنشَقُّ الْأَرْضُ وَتَخِرُّ الْجِبَالُ هَدًّا
column3: The heavens almost rupture therefrom and the earth splits open and the mountains collapse in devastation

column2: أَن دَعَوْا لِلرَّحْمَنِ وَلَدًا
column3: That they attribute to the Most Merciful a son.

column2: وَمَا يَنبَغِى لِلرَّحْمَنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا
column3: And it is not appropriate for the Most Merciful that He should take a son.

column2: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِى السَّمَوَتِ وَالْأَرْضِ
column3: There is no one in the heavens and earth

column2: إِلَّا ءَاتِى الرَّحْمَنِ عَبْدًا
column3: but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant.

column2: لَّقَدْ أَحْصَىهُمْ
column3: He has enumerated them

column2: وَعَدَّهُمْ عَدًّا
column3: and counted them a [full] counting.

column2: وَكُلُّهُمْ ءَاتِيهِ
column3: And all of them are coming to Him

column2: يَوْمَ الْقِيَمَةِ فَرْدًا
column3: on the Day of Resurrection alone.

column2: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا
column3: Indeed, those who have believed

column2: وَعَمِلُوا الصَّلِحَتِ
column3: and done righteous deeds -

column2: سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ الرَّحْمَنُ وُدًّا
column3: the Most Merciful will appoint for them affection.

column2: فَإِنَّمَا
column3: So, [O Muhammad],

column2: يَسَّرْنَهُ
column3: We have only made it [i.e., the Qur’an]

column2: بِلِسَانِكَ
column3: easy in your tongue [i.e., the Arabic language]

column2: لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ الْمُتَّقِينَ
column3: that you may give good tidings thereby to the righteous

column2: وَتُنذِرَ بِهِ قَوْمًا لُّدًّا
column3: and warn thereby a hostile people.

column2: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ
column3: And how many have We destroyed before them of generations?

column2: هَلْ تُحِسُّ مِنْهُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ
column3: Do you perceive of them anyone

column2: أَوْ تَسْمَعُ لَهُمْ رِكْزًا
column3: or hear from them a sound?
